name: Clin M Peritoneum Female Gen
title: Clinical M
notes:
**Note:** When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, use the metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage - see Registrar notes.
* If the only information is FIGO IIIC, assign the appropriate stage and leave clinical T, N, and M blank.
